content.p:
The Channels Data module gives access to elements stored in persistent models. Configuration determines which model is targeted. The following operations are supported:
Opening a model
Deleting a model
Querying a model
Creating an element
Deleting an element
Getting an element
Updating an element
Synchroning accesses
Asynchronous accesses to elements are synchronized via a Multiple Reads Exclusive Write synchronizer.
This library requires that DBXML is installed on your host operating system. You can download the latest version here.

A model is an XML container configured in /etc/dbxml_config where the container for current model is named.
The following set of accessors provide tools for accessing the model.
